thread.title: Man takes selfie-a-day for eight years
thread.title_full: Man takes selfie-a-day for eight years

title: Man takes selfie-a-day for eight years
text: Man takes selfie-a-day for eight years 0:36 AM Melissa Caceres A 20-YEAR-OLD man has taken a selfie-a-day for the past eight years. Now, he has shared the more than 3000 images in a time-lapse video. Beliebers troll Melbourne girls 23:15 PM LUKE DENNEHY TWO Melbourne girls followed by Justin Bieber on Instagram have been trolled by the singer’s fans, known as Beliebers. Weather Bureau accuracy shock 19:47 PM Anthony Sharwood SHOCK! Weather bureau accuracy is soaring, and it has two new toys which mean you can schedule barbecues with confidence. What’s with all the sinkholes? 19:35 PM Lauren McMah SINKHOLES capable of swallowing cars, concrete and caravans are suddenly opening up and leaving gaping holes in their wake. Where will the next one be? Sydney in spectacular drone images 19:28 PM Staff writers A PIONEERING drone from 3D Robotics has captured the city’s most iconic locations from the sky in a series of remarkable shots. Magpies really are coming after you 17:49 PM BENEDICT BROOK RIGHT now Australians are under attack from a very bothersome bird. But there are things you can do, from helmets to ham, to deter magpies. Tesla just announced a ludicrous new car 17:25 PM HARRY TUCKER THIS is the future of the family car. It doesn’t run on petrol, is the safest SUV ever made and is as quick as a Lamborghini. All while carrying seven people. Greens to Turnbull: Put us out of business 15:52 PM Malcolm Farr YOU don’t hear this much in politics. The Greens today provided Prime Minister Malcolm Turnbull with a plan to wipe them off the electoral map. YouTube user Hugo Cornellier has taken a selfie a day for eight years October 1, 2015 12:36am Facial hair ... Hugo Cornellier’s appearance has changed a lot over the past eight years. Picture: YouTube
